name: pullim
description: ZOOM API를 활용한 헬스 트레이너 서비스 "풀림"

scripts.win_key_permission: icacls.exe pullim.pem /reset && icacls.exe pullim.pem /grant:r %username%:(R) && icacls.exe pullim.pem /inheritance:r
scripts.front-publish: cd ./react && npm run build && npm run export && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "f/publish rebuild" && git push
scripts.publish: npm run backend-publish && npm run  front-publish
